title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Fry the pancetta or bacon until crispy; add garlic if desired.
Whisk together eggs and Parmesan in a bowl.
Drain pasta, reserving some cooking water.
Quickly toss hot pasta with bacon and egg-cheese mixture, adding reserved water if needed.
Serve immediately with extra Parmesan and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked through.
Melt butter in a pan, add tomato puree and cook for 5 minutes.
Add cream and simmer.
Add chicken to sauce, stir well, and cook for another 5 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Crispy taco shells filled with seasoned beef, cheese, and fresh toppings.
instructions: Cook ground beef in a skillet until browned.
Add taco seasoning and a splash of water, simmer for 5 minutes.
Warm taco shells according to package instructions.
Fill shells with beef, cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, and onions.
Serve immediately.
